title: What Washington is doing to bring needed change to its culture (Football 7/23)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Jason La Canfora to break down issues around the league right now. First, the guys discuss the culture of Washington's football team and how they are addressing last week's report. They've made a great hire in Julie Donaldson, but what other hires should they make? Then, Brinson and JLC give further analysis on the likelihood of the NFL having a full season in 2020 and and concerns related to COVID-19.

Will Brinson is joined by Jason La Canfora to break down issues around the league right now. First, the guys discuss the culture of Washington's football team and how they are addressing last week's report. They've made a great hire in Julie Donaldson, but what other hires should they make? Then, Brinson and JLC give further analysis on the likelihood of the NFL having a full season in 2020 and and concerns related to COVID-19.
